name: Tarzan's Lost World
description: Ho Chi Minh city's biggest neighbor is now on stage to give you all the attractiveness of this "bushwalk" which turns out to be unforgettable once setting foot on. Dong Nai has in it a world of wilderness craving for true exploration. Sight-seeing, ostrich riding, grass-skiing, one-in-a-million foods and other incredible experiences are waiting for you – enthusiastic explorers.
